column3:
選ばれし者…

其方の名はリンク

時は満ちた…
大いなる試練を其方に与えよう
この地 コログの森にて
デクの樹の声に耳を傾けるが良い
其方を新たな試練へと
導いてくれよう
column4:
Chosen one...


The hero called Link...


The time has come. You are now ready
to test the limits of your courage.

Heed the Great Deku Tree's words at
this sacred place, the Korok Forest.

Do so, and a glorious trial will be
bestowed upon you.
